participant_1.background:
I usually spend my free time practicing music or reading about clothing trends.
i am an art teacher.
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I enjoy spending time with my nieces and nephews, helping them get fit and have fun at the same time.
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.

participant_2.background:
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
i am twenty five years old.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Hey, it's going great! I just got home from my day job and I'm about to make some dinner. What about you?
Pretty good! I have a day off today and I'm just hanging out at home. I'm planning on spending some time practicing music and reading about clothing trends.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day off! I love to read about fashion too. What's your favorite piece of clothing that you own?
It's a tie between my favorite pair of jeans and my favorite dress. My jeans are super comfortable and go with everything, and my dress is super cute and makes me feel confident.
Those both sound great! I'm not a big jeans person myself, but I love dresses. I have a few that I wear all the time.
I'm glad to hear that! I think everyone should have at least one pair of jeans that they love.
I agree! They're so versatile and comfortable.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm sure we'd get along great.
I think so too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Same here! Do you want to exchange numbers and hang out sometime?
